article.title: Do dogs know their name?
article.content: Yes, dogs are capable of knowing their name and nicknames.

article.title: Essential tips to raise healthy pets
article.content: Exercise your pet. Feed your pet a balanced, nutritious diet. Have your veterinarian examine your pet at least once a year to make sure your pet is healthy and to help detect problems earlier. Vaccinate your pet against potentially deadly diseases such as distemper, parvo, panleukopenia and rabies.

article.title: Why does my dog attack me?
article.content: There are multiple reasons that a dog may exhibit aggression toward family members. The most common causes include conflict aggression, fear-based, defensive aggression, status related aggression, possessive aggression, food guarding aggression and redirected aggression

article.title: How to throw a birthday party for your dog
article.content: Find a Fitting Venue. ... Choose a Dog Birthday Party Theme. ... Plan Some Fun Activities and Party Games. ... Serve Up Tasty Treats. ... Serve Pupcakes. ... Dress Up Your Dog in Something Cute. ... Stage a Photoshoot. ... Create Doggy Goody Bags for the Guests
